definition: to inconvenience/to trouble (sb with a request)
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
to feel vexed/to bother/to trouble/superfluous and confusing/edgy

sentences.english: Would you mind helping me fax out these letters?
sentences.chinese: 可否劳烦你帮我用传真发出这些邀请信？

sentences.english: IOKANAAN: Angel of the Lord God what cost thou here with thy sword?
sentences.chinese: 上帝的天使，何劳烦您在此动剑？

definition: to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/vexation/inconvenience
(polite) thank you for your trouble (used when asking a favor or after having received one)
undue trouble/Thank you for having gone out of your way to help me.
to take a lot of trouble (over sb or sth)/may I trouble you (to do sth)
Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
to worry/to be on one's mind
to request sb to do sth/please!
